linter-cli
===============================

version number: 0.0.1
author: Ernst Odolphi

Overview
--------

CLI client for lint service

Installation / Usage
--------------------

To install use pip:

    $ pip install linter-cli


Or clone the repo:

    $ git clone https://github.com/eodolphi/linter-cli.git
    $ python setup.py install
